thread.section_title: Empire Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Never changes
thread.title_full: Never changes - Review of Empire Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dewayne M
title: Never changes
text: Location is the only reason to stay here for us. The rooms are overpriced, furniture beat up, draft in window, could not read the warm/cold on dial it was so old and worn out, no hot water one morning, no wash cltohes or coffee. All of this reported to front desk and never heard a peep from management over the course of four day staff. Seem very disinterested
